root.title: societ general dutch unit launch cd programm
root.body: amsterdam unit french bank societ general sai launch 50 mln guilder five month certif deposit programm start march 6 end septemb 7 denomin will on mln guilder price set march 4 issu date march 6 redempt par septemb 7 subscript place societ general oolder en de jong c.v haighton en ruth b.v. global note issu will deposit dutch central bank
